entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
